content: *the bright crayon colors will delight your favorite child crocheted with the yarn doubled it s a quick and easy project lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 1307ad skill level beginner + level 2 wool-ease® sportweight article #660 *discontinued* 5 colors 870 yards each *ed note experiment with 1 strand of heavy yarn to replace discontinued sportweight yarn to achieve the gauge you prefer * crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge each pattern repeat = 7 18 cm afghan is crocheted with 2 strands of wool-ease sportweight held together throughout work row in pattern following color sequence
